Body:
cookie = Cookie(name, value, datetime_to_cookie_format(expires) if expires else
    None, domain, path, http_only, secure, datetime_to_cookie_format(
    max_age) if max_age else None, same_site)
value = scribe.write_response_cookie(cookie)
assert value == expected_result
pytest.mark.parametrize(
    'name,value,expires,domain,path,http_only,secure,max_age,same_site,expected_result'
    , COOKIES)
